title: Ritualist sentenced to death for killing two brothers in Kogi

organizations.name: justice alaba omoleye-ajileye of high court

text:
Tweet 
Gbenga Odogun, Lokoja 
A ritualist has been sentenced to death by hanging for killing two brothers in Koton Karfe, Kogi State. 
Ibrahim Mohammed was accused of killing the brothers, Muhammed Kudu Abubakar and Tanko Umar Abubakar, by first administering poison to them to weaken them and thereafter hit them on the head with pestle. 
He them proceeded to bury their corpses in a shallow grave in his compound. 
The first charge against against Mohammed read, “That you, Ibrahim Muhammed on or about the 10th day of January, 2016 at Kugbani village within the Kogi State judicial division, robbed Tanko Abubakar of his Toyota Carina E Wangon with registration number BDA 902AA and thereby committed an offence punishable under section 298(a) of the penal code. 
The second charge read, “That you, Ibrahim Muhammed on or about the 10th day of January, 2016 at Kugbani village within the Kogi State judicial division, did commit culpable homicide punishable with death by doing an act to wit: you killed Tanko Abubakar by hitting him on the head with a pestle with the intention of killing him and you thereby committed an offence punishable under section 221(a) of the penal code. 
Delivering judgement, Justice Alaba Omoleye-Ajileye of High Court Koton Karfe, said the two brothers had set out on a journey with the hope of returning home and indeed told their family members that they would return on a particular day, but the journey turned tragic and bizarre. It became a journey of no return. 
In his ruling Justice Omolaye-Ajileye said, “The facts of robbery in the case flows from the facts of established and already accepted by the court in respect of the second and third heads of charge. 
“With all the pieces of evidence presented by the prosecution: the exhumation of the bodies of Tanko and Mohammed from the compound of the accused, I hold that after poisoning the two brothers as the accused confessed, in his downright criminality, he hit their heads with pestle to hasten their annihilation. And in order to avoid any trace of his brutal and inhuman act,the accused buried the dead bodies of Tanko and Mohammed in his compound. Unfortunately since nothing is hidden under the sky, nemesis caught up with him.” 
The judge added, “By your own word, after poisoning both Tanko and Mohammed and they refused to die, you used a pestle to hit them on their heads. That was a brutal homicide committed with determination and ruthlessness. The manner you committed it, by your own description, makes it a high level of exceptional wickedness that it can only be properly marked by death sentence, which the only sentence I can pass on you”.
